data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article David Emmanuel M. General (2016): Romblonella longinoi (Hymenoptera: Formicidae), a new species and first record of the genus from Sabah, Malaysia, with a key to the species of Romblonella Wheeler, 1935. Halteres 7: 112-119, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.55319
